name: UNNotificationSettings
desc: The object for managing notification-related settings and the authorization status of your app.

items.name: var authorizationStatus: UNAuthorizationStatus
items.desc: The app's ability to schedule and receive local and remote notifications.

items.name: enum UNAuthorizationStatus
items.desc: Constants indicating whether the app is allowed to schedule notifications.

items.name: var notificationCenterSetting: UNNotificationSetting
items.desc: The setting that indicates whether your app’s notifications appear in Notification Center.

items.name: var lockScreenSetting: UNNotificationSetting
items.desc: The setting that indicates whether your app’s notifications appear on a device’s Lock screen.

items.name: var carPlaySetting: UNNotificationSetting
items.desc: The setting that indicates whether your app’s notifications appear in CarPlay.

items.name: var alertSetting: UNNotificationSetting
items.desc: The authorization status for displaying alerts.

items.name: var badgeSetting: UNNotificationSetting
items.desc: The setting that indicates whether badges appear on your app’s icon.

items.name: var soundSetting: UNNotificationSetting
items.desc: The authorization status for playing sounds for incoming notifications.

items.name: var criticalAlertSetting: UNNotificationSetting
items.desc: The authorization status for playing sounds for critical alerts.

items.name: var announcementSetting: UNNotificationSetting
items.desc: The setting that indicates whether Siri can announce your app’s notifications.

items.name: var scheduledDeliverySetting: UNNotificationSetting
items.desc: The setting that indicates the system schedules the notification.

items.name: var timeSensitiveSetting: UNNotificationSetting
items.desc: The setting that indicates the system treats the notification as time-sensitive.

items.name: enum UNNotificationSetting
items.desc: Constants that indicate the current status of a notification setting.

items.name: var alertStyle: UNAlertStyle
items.desc: The type of alert that the app may display when the device is unlocked.

items.name: enum UNAlertStyle
items.desc: Constants indicating the presentation styles for alerts.

items.name: var showPreviewsSetting: UNShowPreviewsSetting
items.desc: The setting that indicates whether the app shows a preview of the notification's content.

items.name: enum UNShowPreviewsSetting
items.desc: Constants indicating the style previewing a notification's content.

items.name: var providesAppNotificationSettings: Bool
items.desc: A Boolean value indicating the system displays a button for in-app notification settings.
